On Thu, Jul 17, 2008 at 3:39 PM, Daniel Brolund
<daniel.brolund@...> wrote:
> [... parallel execution ...]

FYI, We're looking at parallel execution as a baked-in optional
feature in JUnit {4.n | n >= 6}.  We'd love to hear early experience
reports from people who have already extended JUnit for parallel
execution.  Thanks,

   David Saff
